ADDRESS.instruction: Mailing address of the insurance agency

CONTACT_NAME.instruction: Name of the contact person at the insurance agency

PHONE.instruction: Phone number of the insurance agency

FAX.instruction: Fax number of the insurance agency

EMAIL.instruction: Email address of the insurance agency

NAIC_CODE.instruction: NAIC code of the insurance carrier

POLICY_OR_PROGRAM_NAME.instruction: Name of the policy or program offered by the carrier

POLICY_NUMBER.instruction: Policy number assigned by the carrier

UNDERWRITER.instruction: Name of the underwriter handling this policy

NAME.instruction: Name of the line of business

SELECTED.instruction: Whether this line of business was selected for the policy

PREMIUM.instruction: Premium amount for this line of business

SELECTED.instruction: Whether this attachment was included with the application

PROPOSED_EFFECTIVE_DATE.instruction: Proposed effective date of the policy

PROPOSED_EXPIRATION_DATE.instruction: Proposed expiration date of the policy

BILLING_PLAN.instruction: Billing plan for the policy (e.g. direct, agency)

METHOD_OF_PAYMENT.instruction: Method of payment for the policy

NAMED_INSURED_NAME.instruction: Name of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_ADDRESS.instruction: Mailing address of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_GL_CODE.instruction: GL CODE of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_SIC.instruction: SIC of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_NCAICS.instruction: NAICS of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_FEIN_OR_SOC_SEC.instruction: FEIN OR SOC SEC of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_PHONE.instruction: Business phone number of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_WEBSITE.instruction: Website address of the primary named insured

NAMED_INSURED_TYPE.instruction: Legal structure of the primary named insured (e.g. corporation, partnership)

OTHER_NAMED_INSURED_NAME.instruction: Name of any other named insured

OTHER_NAMED_INSURED_ADDRESS.instruction: Mailing address of any other named insured

OTHER_NAMED_INSURED_PHONE.instruction: Business phone number of any other named insured

OTHER_NAMED_INSURED_WEBSITE.instruction: Website address of any other named insured

OTHER_NAMED_INSURED_TYPE.instruction: Legal structure of any other named insured (e.g. corporation, partnership)

OTHER_NAMED_INSURED_TAX_ID.instruction: Tax ID number of any other named insured

NAME.instruction: Name of the line of business

SELECTED.instruction: Whether this line of business was selected for the policy

PREMIUM.instruction: Premium amount for this line of business

SELECTED.instruction: Whether this attachment was included with the application

LINES_OF_BUSINESS.instruction: List of lines of business selected for this policy along with their premiums

ATTACHMENTS.instruction: List of attachments included with this insurance application
